thread.title: Shirely Doyle
thread.title_full: Teleflorist Ireland reviewed by Shirely Doyle

author: Shirely Doyle
title: Shirely Doyle
text: The delivery could not be arranged on the specified day as the local florists were closed for a half day that day. I was contacted immediately and the flowers were delivered the time i wanted the next day, The bouquet was beautiful and the recipient was very happy,
